column1: steve l. kish| of lake le ann
column4: 2015 at the age of 94 years. he was preceded in death by his wife of 60 years
column6: daughters helen kish and patricia davis. he is survived by four children
column10: and louis george (niki); 22 grandchildren; 15 great grandchildren; and sister
column11: margaret swek. he was an amazing husband
column14: who was loved by all. steve was a wwii veteran serving with the seebees. the mass of the christian burial will be held on saturday at 11:00 am at st. joseph shrine catholic church in the irish hills with burial to follow in the church cemetery with fr. robert pienta officiating. the family will receive friends at the desnoyer funeral home on friday
column16: 2015 from 2-8 pm and on saturday at the church from 10:00-11:00 am. a rosary service will be held at the funeral home on friday
